body:
Hey guys, Here is my last Avicus Montage (5), What do u think?
Maybe you see the dislikes and you said.. *WTF??* Yeah, i have an official group of haters.. :c
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Bt52kNVpKaU
Thanks!

title: My last Avicus YT Montage,  What do u think?

replies.body:
Wow, I actually really like it!

The music is very calming, and the majority of your scenes are quite action packed. You're very good at PvP, btw ;D

One thing I noticed is that you only rendered at 480p, and while that's fine, I love watching videos fullscreen at 1080p. If it's not possible to render that high, it's perfectly okay.
Also, the music was cut out for a few seconds, which can really kill off the momentum and energy of a montage.
Btw, what was the resource pack used at around 4:22? It looks really sick!
